Stats of Pushing the Limit
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Short Fiction: Stats of Pushing the Limit
By mepersoner on Tuesday, May 22, 2001 - 07:18 pm:

I liked something to gauge all the monsters while I wrote this story, figured I'd post it seeing that if anyone ever reads the story, it'll be good to know.
